summary: This document appears to be an email or internal communication forwarding a news article from the Daily Mail. The article alleges that Ghislaine Maxwell paid Jacob Wohl $25,000 to smear victims of Jeffrey Epstein. The communication is dated July 21, 2020.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Allegedly paid Jacob Wohl to smear victims of Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jacob Wohl
persons.context: Allegedly paid by Ghislaine Maxwell to smear victims of Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: His victims were allegedly the target of a smear campaign paid for by Ghislaine Maxwell.

connections.description: Alleged payment from Maxwell to Wohl for services to smear Epstein's victims.
Maxwell is alleged to have taken action (funding a smear campaign) related to Epstein's victims.

events.title: Daily Mail Article on Maxwell-Wohl Allegation
events.description: The Daily Mail publishes an article alleging Ghislaine Maxwell paid Jacob Wohl $25,000 to smear Jeffrey Epstein's victims.

keyFacts: An article from the Daily Mail dated July 21, 2020, is referenced.
The article alleges Ghislaine Maxwell paid Jacob Wohl $25,000.
The alleged payment was for Wohl to smear the victims of Jeffrey Epstein.
